text:
Coronary artery disease (CAD, ischemic heart disease)
   Assessment:
   HR 80
s SR with freq. PAC
s and occas. PVC.
   Right fem. Cath site D/I.  no ooze.  HCT stable.  reports decrease pain
   at site.
   ASA desensitization begun at 2245.  pt. felt ears warm/red ~ MN- no
   other itching/rash/edema etc.
   Action:
   Given 25mg IV benadryl at MN .
   Heparin gtt started in eve at 1200u/hr with bolus per order
   Beta blocker held per HO
 records show that pt. took all meds at OSH.
   Response:
   Tolerated completion of ASA des.
 last dose of ASA at 0100.  pt.
   mildly anxious.
   HR increasing to [**Street Address(2) 3144**]
 K+ 4.7.
   Plan:
   NPO for possible re-cath/intervention in AM.
   Continue CV meds as ordered.
   Monitor PTT on Heparin gtt.
   .H/O chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD, Bronchitis,
   Emphysema) with Acute Exacerbation
   Assessment:
   HX COPD
 exacerbated by heart failure/CHF.
   Pt. c/o wheezing at [**2122**]
crackes at bases with expiratory wheezes
   throughout.
   Action:
   Given 40mg IV lasix at 2100, also given atrovent/alberteral neb rx
   Response:
   Diuresed 2L u/o.  becoming more wheezy
 more so at end of
   desentization at 0100.
   *******  event:    0100-0200
pt. c/o increase wheezing/asthma,
   Plan:

info.concept: Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease of horses
Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease of horses
